mapper.select: SELECT club.club_num as clubNum , member_num as memberNum , club.club_thumb_pic as clubThumbPic, club.club_name as clubName, club.club_enddate as endDate, club.club_startdate as startDate FROM apply , club WHERE apply.club_num = club.club_num AND apply.member_num = #{memberNum} AND club.club_num not in ( SELECT club.club_num FROM review WHERE review.club_num = club.club_num AND review.member_num = #{memberNum});

SELECT club.club_num as clubNum , member_num as memberNum , club.club_thumb_pic as clubThumbPic, club.club_name as clubName, club.club_enddate as endDate, club.club_startdate as startDate FROM review , club WHERE review.club_num = club.club_num and review.member_num = #{memberNum};
SELECT * FROM review WHERE club_num = #{clubNum} ORDER BY review_regdate DESC LIMIT 0, 5
SELECT * FROM review WHERE club_num = #{clubNum} LIMIT #{startIndex}, 5
SELECT count(*) FROM review WHERE club_num = 11
